doc:
Louie Spicolli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louie_Spicolli 0 Louis Mucciolo Jr. (February 10, 1971 – February 15, 1998) was an American professional wrestler. He performed in Mexico under the ring name Madonna's Boyfriend, for the World Wrestling Federation as Rad Radford, and in Extreme Championship Wrestling and World Championship Wrestling in the 1990s as Louie Spicolli. He is sometimes credited as being the inventor of the Death Valley driver finisher and even wore T-shirts in WCW stating it, though it was actually innovated by female wrestler Etsuko Mita. Louis_Mucciolo_Jr. ( February_10_,_1971 – February_15_,_1998 ) was an_American_professional_wrestler . He performed in Mexico under the_ring_name_Madonna 's_Boyfriend , for the_World_Wrestling_Federation as Rad_Radford , and in Extreme_Championship_Wrestling and World_Championship_Wrestling in the_1990s as Louie_Spicolli . He is_sometimes_credited as being the_inventor of the_Death_Valley_driver_finisher and even_wore T-shirts in WCW stating it , though it was_actually_innovated by female_wrestler_Etsuko_Mita .
